game.name: Gladiator Command
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 게임 메뉴 음성 안내, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A gladiator management sim inspired by the depth and progression of Football Manager. Train fighters, hire staff, manage finances, build prestige, buy and sell gladiators, develop traits and stat based skills, and let real-time arena battles decide your rise.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A gladiator management sim inspired by the depth and progression of Football Manager. Train fighters, hire staff, manage finances, build prestige, buy and sell gladiators, develop traits and stat based skills, and let real-time arena battles decide your rise.
